name: DiceStacker
description:
Can you reach a stack of 8?

Shake your cup to keep momentum and build a tower of dice.
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 2 days.

Scratched Ideas for the Jam: Timer.

Controls
  • Mouse - Move the cup along table.
  • Shift + Mouse Vertical - Move the cup up and down.
  • Mouse left/right click - Tilt the cup to quickly sweep some dice. (Needed to be unlocked.)
  • Esc - Pause/Unpause.(might need to double tap for the webgl version)
  • R - Reset Level
